article_title: Weak Global Growth Threatens U.S. Recovery

article_metadata.description: If the U.S. recovery is to continue in any sort of meaningful way with a global slowdown afoot, policymakers (aside from team Yellen) must prioritize growth. This is something the Obama Administration has not yet done.
article_metadata.author: Abby McCloskey

og.description: If the U.S. recovery is to continue in any sort of meaningful way with a global slowdown afoot, policymakers (aside from team Yellen) must prioritize growth. This is something the Obama Administration has not yet done.
